document.full_text: lawyers for cleve foster, a former army recruiter scheduled to be executed on tuesday, are challenging the state over substitution of pentobarbital for a drug that is in short supply.
document.title: in last-minute action, texas inmate disputes use of execution drug
lines_and_colors: lawyers for cleve foster, a former army recruiter scheduled to be executed on tuesday, are challenging the state over substitution of pentobarbital for a drug that is in short supply.
